summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Richard Kahn and Rafael Otoya regarding the transfer of assets. Kahn is inquiring about updates on the status of asset transfers and credits related to new investments. The emails indicate ongoing communication about financial matters.

Richard Kahn is inquiring about the status of asset transfers and credits.
The transfer of assets was reported as finished prior to the date of the emails.
